attributes.title: Biased app!
attributes.review: Due to downloading this app I received texts from trumps campaign which were extremely biased and unsettling. He used specific wording to encourage his fans to think he’s a saint and everyone else is horrible. In case you don’t know, Donald trump is horrible, as is this app

attributes.title: Dear the creator of this app.
attributes.review: I got the app to see how it was and it kept making my phone glitch I was supper annoyed remember  all phones matter I have the right to be upset never again going to get this app again I am beyond disappointed.🙄

attributes.title: UNBELIEVABLY BAD
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download. I broke my toe trying sign in because it wanted me to use a toe print. Overall it’s not a good app, every ten seconds it logs me out again. Also all the rest of my apps were gone. I had 10k Diamonds in my minecraft world and it got destroyed.

attributes.title: OMG! Don’t download!!
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app because 🍊Trump 🍊2020😍! But was disappointed as soon as I opened it. The way everything is placed is so confusing, and it also kept crashing. I thought it was my phone but it was just the app.
attributes.userName: b e a n s b e a n s

attributes.title: Are used to like trump but now… I don’t know what to think
attributes.review: Wow everytime I open this app it shows me a picture of Trump. I really want to get behind his ideas but I just keep seeing him and honestly, I just can’t vote for someone that ugly. Just not gonna happen.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Minute I download this app my phone crashed and when I opened the app it was glitching and I got a virus, it was so bad I had to get another phone and I’m using my new phone to write this and inform people that this app should 100% get deleted. Trump 2020 🥰on a gravestone🧚💖💫

attributes.title: ✨TikTok✨
attributes.review: Gen z is not gonna go without a fight😚this app is terrible cause when I “tried” 🤬downloading it it took several days and then I opened it I was sooo scared cause I forgot I downloaded it and thought someone leaked my info and bought this stupid app and just terrible

attributes.title: AWFUL!
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE. it doesn’t help, it lags like crazy, it crashes non stop, the developer doesn’t keep up with it, it’s insanely unorganized, I’ve never been so quick to delete an app! it’s horrible. highly highly HIGHLY DONT recommend downloading.
attributes.userName: Lightning bugz as they teach me how to dance vt a thrwat threat id like to make myself

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: That’s it, don’t download it. I had to get a new phone because of this trash app. All my data was deleted and literally nothing was left. Was waiting to see what Trump has planned for the rest of his extremely saddening presidential career... very disappointing.

attributes.title: ✨ Horrendously terrible ✨
attributes.review: I got the app because I wanted to see any reasons to vote for an ✨orange ✨ however as soon as I downloaded it a freaking bird got into my house and tried taking my phone! I swear, trump set me up. Don’t get this app, it’s controlled by the government and will ruin your life 🥰
